text:
Hello, I am a smol floof trying to find Julia internships / entry jobs in Deep Learning.  Where are good places to look or people to ask? :pleading_face:

Picture for reference:

elements.text: Hello, I am a smol floof trying to find Julia internships / entry jobs in Deep Learning.  Where are good places to look or people to ask?

text: aww. That is a very smol floof

elements.text: aww. That is a very smol floof

text: It’s how I feel when I look at job descriptions.  I’m finishing my Physics degree, know the PyData stack, and, well, when it came time to pick a DL framework, I figured I should start with Julia because it’s just the best.

elements.text: It’s how I feel when I look at job descriptions.  I’m finishing my Physics degree, know the PyData stack, and, well, when it came time to pick a DL framework, I figured I should start with Julia because it’s just the best.

text: Oh, I should add that it’s just a Bachelors degree.  I wish I could apply for those graduate internships. :pensive:

elements.text: Oh, I should add that it’s just a Bachelors degree.  I wish I could apply for those graduate internships.

text: I mean, those internships don't say anything about requiring a graduate degree

elements.text: I mean, those internships don't say anything about requiring a graduate degree

text: I think you should take the shot. *Something something* you miss 100%...

elements.text: I think you should take the shot.

text:
I looked at it again and saw that they were saying “Desirable Qualifications”.

Desirable Qualifications:

Your background and interests are closely aligned with the projects our research team will be working on during the period of internship.
You demonstrate high aptitude for learning new skills and problem solving.
You are able to work effectively in multi-disciplinary environment.
*You already have attained, or are actively working towards Master or PhD in a relevant field.*

elements.text:
I looked at it again and saw that they were saying “Desirable Qualifications”.

Desirable Qualifications:

Your background and interests are closely aligned with the projects our research team will be working on during the period of internship.
You demonstrate high aptitude for learning new skills and problem solving.
You are able to work effectively in multi-disciplinary environment.
You already have attained, or are actively working towards Master or PhD in a relevant field.

text:
(emphasis mine)
Do you think they’re just wishing for an MS or PhD student?

elements.text:
(emphasis mine)
Do you think they’re just wishing for an MS or PhD student?

text: I’ve heard from a couple of people that the interesting ML work is locked behind a graduate degree requirement, so whenever I see jobs require an MS or PhD, I figure my resume will get filtered out.

elements.text: I’ve heard from a couple of people that the interesting ML work is locked behind a graduate degree requirement, so whenever I see jobs require an MS or PhD, I figure my resume will get filtered out.

text: Give it a shot!! To be honest, I'm also a bachelors degree almost-soon-to-be-grad and I also would love to get some of this sort of data sci/ML work too. I'm hoping to build a strong portfolio in Julia and then continuing to target Julia positions because I too see a strong future in Julia moving forward. At least that's the plan haha we'll see how it goes for the both of us!

elements.text: Give it a shot!! To be honest, I'm also a bachelors degree almost-soon-to-be-grad and I also would love to get some of this sort of data sci/ML work too. I'm hoping to build a strong portfolio in Julia and then continuing to target Julia positions because I too see a strong future in Julia moving forward. At least that's the plan haha we'll see how it goes for the both of us!

text: But I do encourage you to just go out there and apply!! I'm just trying to strengthen and prep my portfolio before applying. I think we all just need that voice that encourages us to go out there and keep achieving!!

elements.text: But I do encourage you to just go out there and apply!! I'm just trying to strengthen and prep my portfolio before applying. I think we all just need that voice that encourages us to go out there and keep achieving!!

text: (I'm thinking of doing grad school after a couple years hopefully as society recovers more and more after COVID, whatever that might look like) Maybe grad school in your future to help secure more applications might help too? At least thats my plan so far
